admin_pages_categories.subheader_no_data: Sort your additional pages by categories.

main.subheader: The main settings of the page category.

secondary.subheader: Extra settings for the page category.

input.title: Title
input.icon_help: Font Awesome icon, leave empty for no icon.
input.order_help: Easily arrange pages categories with numbers. Displaying on the website is ascendent.

admin_pages_category_delete_modal.subheader: All the pages inside this category will be deleted as well. This action cannot be undone.
admin_pages_category_delete_modal.success_message: Pages category deletion was performed successfully!

admin_pages.title: Pages management
admin_pages.subheader_no_data: Create additional pages that you can attach to the platform with ease.

main.subheader: The main settings of the page.

input.title: Title
input.order_help: Easily arrange pages with numbers. Displaying on the website is ascendent.

table.name: Plan Name
table.custom_help: Custom plans can be defined directly from the User Update page.

main.subheader: Define the main settings of the plan.

trial.days_help: The number of days that the trial plan can be used.

main.name: Name
main.taxes_ids_help: Easily select which of your %screated taxes%s you want to apply per plan.

plan.subheader: Choose which features to enable for this plan.
plan.events_children_limit_help: Tracking of the behaviour of the users on the website such as (clicks, resizes, form submissions..etc). Set to 0 to disable the feature, set -1 for unlimited.
plan.events_children_retention_help: How many days will the data be kept in the database.
plan.sessions_replays_limit_help: Full and advanced Tracking of the behaviour of the users on the website and the ability to replay those actions. Set to 0 to disable the feature, set -1 for unlimited.
plan.sessions_replays_retention_help: How many days will the data be kept in the database.
plan.sessions_replays_time_limit_help: The maximum amount of minutes the session replay will record events for.
plan.websites_heatmaps_limit_help: How many heatmaps can the user create. Set to 0 to disable the feature, set -1 for unlimited.
plan.websites_goals_limit_help: Gives the user the ability to track their website goals with the Goals functionality. Set to 0 to disable the feature, set -1 for unlimited.
plan.no_ads_help: Enabling this will make all people having this plan to not see any ads.
plan.email_reports_is_enabled_help: Enabling this will give all people having this plan the ability to enable email reports for their websites.
plan.teams_is_enabled_help: Enabling this will give all people having this plan the ability to use the Teams system to create and invite people to their teams.
plan.api_is_enabled_help: Enable ability for the user to use the REST API.

admin_plan_delete_modal.subheader: By deleting the plan, all the recurring subscriptions of this plan will be cancelled. Users will still have their features they paid for until the Expiration Date of the plan. This action cannot be undone.

update_users_plan_settings.button: Update and update plan subscribers as well
update_users_plan_settings.button_help: By updating the plan subscribers you will overwrite all their current settings with the new settings of this plan.

error_message.disabled_plans: You are not allowed to disable all the plans which are available (Custom plans are not considered if the payment system is disabled).

admin_codes.title: Codes management
admin_codes.subheader_no_data: Create discount codes or fully redeemable codes that you can share to your users.

main.plan_id_help: Which plan to make the code available for.
main.days_help: How many days will the plan be available for.
main.discount_help: Choose a discount between 1% and 99% off for the code
main.quantity_help: How many time the code can be used.

admin_code_update.title: Edit Code
admin_code_update.subheader: Changing the settings will not have any effect on already redeemed or used codes.
admin_code_update.subheader2: You can share the code with a shareable link: %s

admin_taxes.title: Taxes management
admin_taxes.subheader_no_data: Create taxes that you can use and apply to paid plans.

main.internal_name_help: This name won't be shown to the user.
main.name: Tax name
main.billing_type_help: Select for who you want to apply this tax for.
main.countries_help: Select the countries that you want to apply this tax on. Leave empty if you want the tax to be applied for all countries.

admin_tax_create.title: Create Tax
admin_tax_create.subheader: Once a tax is created, it can't be edited or deleted. After the tax is created, you can associate it with your created Plans.

admin_affiliate_withdrawal_delete_modal.success_message: Affiliate withdrawal request deletion was performed successfully!

admin_affiliate_withdrawal_approve_modal.subheader: If you approve the withdrawal, the affiliate withdrawal will be considered as completed and the user will get notified via email. Don't forget to send their payment.
admin_affiliate_withdrawal_approve_modal.success_message: Affiliate withdrawal request was approved was performed successfully!

admin_payment_approve_modal.subheader: If you approve the payment, the plan for the user will start.

error_message.name_length: The name field must be between 3 and 32 characters!
error_message.email_exists: This email is already used by another account!
error_message.short_password: Your password is too short, you must have at least 6 characters!
error_message.passwords_not_matching: Your entered passwords do not match!

admin_user_delete_modal.subheader: By deleting the user, everything that is linked to the user will be deleted. This action cannot be undone.

admin_user_login_modal.subheader: By logging in as another user, you will be logged out of the current account and fully logged in to this user.
admin_user_login_modal.success_message: Successfully logged in as %s! To get out of this account simply use the logout function.

main.subheader: Profile details, status and permissions of the account.
main.name: Name
main.type_help: Admin users will have the same privileges as you, be careful!

plan.subheader: Change and update the plan of the user.
plan.plan_expiration_date_invalid: Keep in mind, this plan expiration date is in the past. You can still save it like this, though.

change_password.subheader: Leave it empty if you don't want to change the user's password!

main.name: Name
main.type_help: Admin users will have the same privileges as you, be careful!

logs.subheader: A recent list of the most important recorded activity.

admin_website_delete_modal.subheader: By deleting the website, everything that is sub linked to the website will be deleted. This action cannot be undone.

admin_settings.title: Website Settings
admin_settings.documentation: Read the Documentation to get more details on certain available configurations.

main.title: Website title
main.default_language_help: To add more languages, please consult the documentation.
main.logo_help: jpg, jpeg, png, gif, or svg accepted. Recommended size: Max height of 40px and transparent.
main.opengraph_help: jpg, jpeg, png or gif accepted.
main.email_confirmation_help: Send out email confirmation when a user registers or changes his email address.
main.register_is_enabled_help: Allow people to register on your platform or completely disable the register page.
main.default_timezone_help: The default timezone for users when they are registering (they can change it later on).
main.index_url_help: Set the full custom index url ( ex: https://google.com/ ) if you want to completely disable the default landing page of the product. Helpful when you want to have your own landing page. Leave empty to disable.
main.terms_and_conditions_url_help: Link to the terms and conditions of the website. Can be a link created with the Pages creator from the sidebar.
main.privacy_policy_url_help: Link to the privacy policy of the website. Can be a link created with the Pages creator from the sidebar.

payment.is_enabled_help: Disabling the payment system will remove all the options for the users to upgrade their accounts or see any payment related information.
payment.brand_name_help: The brand name will be used for displaying the brand when users purchase via payment gates. (ex: paypal)
payment.currency_help: Currency Code for the payments (ex: USD).
payment.codes_is_enabled_help: Enabling the discount codes system will enable users to add a discount code created from the admin panel, before they checkout.
payment.taxes_and_billing_is_enabled_help: Enabling this feature will require users to fill in their Billing info before checking out and you will also be able to create taxes for each created plan.
payment.offline_payment_instructions_help: Payment instructions for the user to see, before submitting the payment.

affiliate.is_enabled_help: The affiliate system will enable your users to get paid for bringing other paying users to your platform.
affiliate.commission_type_once: Once - give out commission for the first payment of a referred user
affiliate.commission_type_forever: Forever - give out commission for all the payments of a referred user
affiliate.minimum_withdrawal_amount_help: How much does a user need to have in his balance until he can request a withdrawal.
affiliate.commission_percentage_help: Mow much does a user make for a referred user payment.
affiliate.withdrawal_notes_help: Inform your users about the withdrawal process. You can request them to write in their bank account or Paypal email for example.

business.subheader: These details will be used when generating invoices for the user.
business.invoice_is_enabled_help: This option will determine if users will be able to see invoices for their payments or not.
business.invoice_nr_prefix_help: Your Nr Prefix for all the invoices generated on the system. Ex: INV-
business.name: Name

analytics.sessions_replays_is_enabled_help: Sessions Replays is a more advanced tracking system which tries to track almost everything a user does on a page and visually replay that session to the owner of the site.
analytics.sessions_replays_is_enabled_help2: This feature can be activated but must be carefully used as it may still contain bugs.
analytics.sessions_replays_is_enabled_help3: In certain cases, if the website that is tracked is large and your webhost doesn't allow to post a big amount of data then it could not work properly. Your current POST_MAX_SIZE is: %s.
analytics.sessions_replays_minimum_duration: Minimum duration of a session replay (in seconds)
analytics.sessions_replays_minimum_duration_help: The Cronjob will automatically delete all the sessions replays which do not meet the required duration.
analytics.sessions_replays_minimum_duration_help2: The cron will only delete the replays after 24 hours of user inactivity to make sure the session is not active anymore.
analytics.websites_heatmaps_is_enabled_help: Heatmaps give the user the ability to track specific pages and look for the most used parts of those pages based on data from multiple people.
analytics.pixel_cache_help: Set 0 to disable the cache of the pixel tracking code.
analytics.pixel_exposed_identifier_help: The pixel key is used when telling your users how to customly use your tracking code. An example would be for tracking their goals: your_pixel_exposed_identifier.goal('my-goal');.
analytics.email_reports_is_enabled_help: Enabling the email reports will give your users the ability to get email reports of their website statistics. Make sure to have a proper email sending configuration via the SMTP tab.

captcha.login_is_enabled: Enable captcha on the login page
captcha.register_is_enabled: Enable captcha on the register page
captcha.lost_password_is_enabled: Enable captcha on the lost password page
captcha.resend_activation_is_enabled: Enable captcha on the resend activation page

ads.ads_help: These fields accept text, html or javascript.

socials.socials_help: Social links to be displayed in the footer of the website. Enter only the id / name of the page

smtp.host_help: If there are no values entered in this field then the system will try to use the default mail function.
smtp.from_help: The email that the users get the email from / the 'reply-to' email.
smtp.from_name_help: The name associated with the email below.

custom.head_js_help: Add your own tracking js code ( ex: Google Analytics ).
custom.head_css_help: Add custom CSS in case you want to overwrite certain styles of the website.

announcements.content_help: This field accepts text, html or javascript. Leave empty to disable.

email_notifications.emails_help: Emails that will receive a notification when one of the actions from below are performed. Add valid email addresses separated by a comma.
email_notifications.new_user_help: Receive an email when a new users registers to the website.
email_notifications.new_payment_help: Receive an email when a new payment is successfully processed.
email_notifications.new_affiliate_withdrawal_help: Receive an email when a new affiliate withdrawal request is submitted.

offload.assets_url_help: Full URL to the assets folder from any storage provider, such as: Amazon S3, DigitalOcean Spaces.
offload.uploads_url_help: Full URL to the uploads folder from any storage provider, such as: Amazon S3, DigitalOcean Spaces.

webhooks.user_new_help: Send a webhook with the user_id, email, name details when a new user successfully registers to the site.
webhooks.user_delete_help: Send a webhook with the user_id, email, name details when a user is deleted from the site.

license.license_help: The license you got from purchasing the product.
license.new_license_help: Leave empty if you don't want to change it. Useful when changing your license or upgrading to a new one (ex: from Regular License to Extended )

button.test_email_help: It will send an email to the value from the From field that you set above. Make sure to first save the settings!

success_message.email: The test email has been sent successfully!

admin_plugins.title: Plugins
admin_plugins.subheader_no_data: There are no plugins available for now :(.
admin_plugins.no_access: You must own, install & activate the '%s' plugin to use this feature.

admin_plugin_uninstall_modal.subheader: By uninstalling the plugin, all the potential data related to the plugin will be removed from the system.

admin_plugin_delete_modal.subheader: To delete the plugin, simply go into the plugins folder and delete the plugin.

admin_statistics.title: Website Statistics
admin_statistics.subheader: See how your website evolves throughout time.

payments.subheader: This website has generated %s %s revenue on %s sales.
payments.no_payments: There are no recorded payments for this date range.

email_reports.subheader: How many email reports are sent out per day to your users.

admin_api_documentation.title: Admin API documentation
admin_api_documentation.subheader: This is the documentation for the available API endpoints, only for the admins, which are built around the REST architecture. All the API endpoints will return a JSON response with the standard HTTP response codes and need a Bearer Authentication via an API Key.

authentication.subheader: All the API endpoints require an API key sent by the Bearer Authentication method.

filters.page: The page number that you want results from. Defaults to 1.
filters.results_per_page: How many results you want per page. Allowed values are: %s.
filters.search_by: What field are you searching by. Allowed values are: %s.
filters.order_by: What field to order the results by. Allowed values are: %s.
filters.order_by_type: The ordering of the results. Allowed values are: ASC for ascending ordering, and DESC for descending ordering.

update.plan_id: free, trial or an integer plan_id
update.plan_expiration_date: Y-m-d H:i:s format in UTC timezone

users.one_time_login_code_header: Generate a one time login code

admin_bulk_delete_modal.subheader: You've selected multiple entries to be deleted, this may take a while & it action cannot be undone.
admin_bulk_delete_modal.success_message: The bulk deletion process was performed successfully!
